results.content:
Some aspects like user setup, dialplans & profiles were not explained in enough detail.
I would like to see some defined examples of say an IVR with mulitple options and messages and fault conditions. 
This was a setup walkthrough, which in itself helped my need case, but overall was not fit for prupose.

results.content:
Good enough to get me up and running. The section on installing Ubuntu seemed unnecessary - basic knowledge on installing an OS should be a prerequisite so the time can be spent on the Freeswitch topic, not sysadmin basics.

I'm OK with occasional errors when they show what happens and how to correct them but there were too many places where files had to be deleted or there was other evidence of not preparing the setup prior to recording.
results.content_html:
Good enough to get me up and running. The section on installing Ubuntu seemed unnecessary - basic knowledge on installing an OS should be a prerequisite so the time can be spent on the Freeswitch topic, not sysadmin basics.

I'm OK with occasional errors when they show what happens and how to correct them but there were too many places where files had to be deleted or there was other evidence of not preparing the setup prior to recording.

results.content: Un curso muy limitado, se detallan pocos ejemplos, no se habla de posibles aplicaciones de gestión ni se da ningún tipo de información adicional al respecto, bastante justo el curso!
results.content_html: Un curso muy limitado, se detallan pocos ejemplos, no se habla de posibles aplicaciones de gestión ni se da ningún tipo de información adicional al respecto, bastante justo el curso!

results.content: Waste of time to watch someone installing an OS real-time.. if the steps needed to be shown it could have been edited down to a minute or so.
results.content_html: Waste of time to watch someone installing an OS real-time.. if the steps needed to be shown it could have been edited down to a minute or so.

results.content: The course did not teach a lot about the topics but rather demonstrated each topic. Some more context around each function together with the demo would make it very good.
results.content_html: The course did not teach a lot about the topics but rather demonstrated each topic. Some more context around each function together with the demo would make it very good.

results.content: Esperava entender mais do que apenas fazer acontecer. O curso é muito básico, ele não ensina nada na teoria, apenas mostra como aplicar na prática. Teoria muito fraca, apenas um guia prático de como executar o proposto.

results.content: course presentation is fine but is too outdated to be of much use. Old OSes, deprecated links and repositories mean that you can't really follow along anymore.
